title: Physical Therapy Exercises ACL
description: Having a hard time going for your physiotherapy for your knee injury, ACL injury, ACL surgery, knee surgery, knee osteoarthritis, knee arthritis, knee replacement, or a hip replacement? Curovate Physiotherapy and Physical Therapy Exercises app is here for you. Use Curovate for prehab or before surgery to prepare for your knee surgery, knee replacement, or hip surgery, or to prevent injuries to your knees and hips. Whether you suffer from an ACL injury and are in need of a knee replacement surgery or a hip injury before having a hip replacement surgery, you can use Curovate Physiotherapy and Physical Therapy Exercises app to prepare. Our Physiotherapy and Physical Therapy App, developed by a Physical Therapist with 25 years of healthcare experience, will help you reduce knee pain, ACL injury pain, and motivate you to do your daily physiotherapy and physical therapy knee exercises and recover after injury and surgery! Home exercises for physiotherapy and physical therapy, such as stretching and strengthening your muscles after a knee injury, knee replacement, or hip replacement surgery, will become so much easier with our video-guided physiotherapy and physical therapy app. Curovate is "the physiotherapy and physical therapy app" for patients recovering at home after hip replacement surgery or knee injury. Why You Should Use Curovate Physiotherapy and Physical Therapy App: - Custom and personalized physiotherapy and physical therapy plans for your ACL injury, knee replacement surgery, hip replacement surgery, and knee pain relief exercises. - Set up your own daily physiotherapy and physical therapy knee exercises and workout sessions. Track your progress! - 1-on-1 Zoom appointment with a Physical Therapist. - Chat with a licensed Physical Therapist. - Daily progress tracking of your physiotherapy and physical therapy sessions and home workouts for your ACL injury, knee injury, and knee replacement. - Knee Measuring and Tracking extension angle & flexion. - Easy to use at your own home without having to go to a physiotherapy or physical therapy appointment. For patients who have had an ACL injury, they can use Curovate before surgery or pre-surgery, after ACL surgery, or if they are not planning to have ACL knee surgery. There is also an option to select knee strengthening and hip strengthening if you wish to work on stretching & flexibility exercises for knee pain relief. Curovate will help you achieve your prehab, rehab, and physiotherapy and physical therapy goals. Curovate is a rehab physiotherapy and physical therapy app for people who have had a patellar tendon graft, hamstring tendon graft, quadriceps tendon graft, allograft, or cadaver graft used to repair their ACL. Curovate can also be used after ACL injury and for people planning to recover without knee surgery. Total Knee Replacement or a knee replacement is a surgery for patients who suffer from knee osteoarthritis (knee arthritis), which causes knee pain and limits a person’s ability to exercise. Our physiotherapy and physical therapy app provides daily video knee exercises for people with knee arthritis as well as pre-surgery for knee replacement and after knee replacement. Curovate provides knee replacement stretching, strengthening, and virtual care PT workouts. Technical issues? support@curovate.com
descriptionHTML:
Having a hard time going for your physiotherapy for your knee injury, ACL injury, ACL surgery, knee surgery, knee osteoarthritis, knee arthritis, knee replacement, or a hip replacement? Curovate Physiotherapy and Physical Therapy Exercises app is here for you.

Use Curovate for prehab or before surgery to prepare for your knee surgery, knee replacement, or hip surgery, or to prevent injuries to your knees and hips. Whether you suffer from an ACL injury and are in need of a knee replacement surgery or a hip injury before having a hip replacement surgery, you can use Curovate Physiotherapy and Physical Therapy Exercises app to prepare.

Our Physiotherapy and Physical Therapy App, developed by a Physical Therapist with 25 years of healthcare experience, will help you reduce knee pain, ACL injury pain, and motivate you to do your daily physiotherapy and physical therapy knee exercises and recover after injury and surgery!

Home exercises for physiotherapy and physical therapy, such as stretching and strengthening your muscles after a knee injury, knee replacement, or hip replacement surgery, will become so much easier with our video-guided physiotherapy and physical therapy app. Curovate is "the physiotherapy and physical therapy app" for patients recovering at home after hip replacement surgery or knee injury.

Why You Should Use Curovate Physiotherapy and Physical Therapy App:
- Custom and personalized physiotherapy and physical therapy plans for your ACL injury, knee replacement surgery, hip replacement surgery, and knee pain relief exercises.
- Set up your own daily physiotherapy and physical therapy knee exercises and workout sessions. Track your progress!
- 1-on-1 Zoom appointment with a Physical Therapist.
- Chat with a licensed Physical Therapist.
- Daily progress tracking of your physiotherapy and physical therapy sessions and home workouts for your ACL injury, knee injury, and knee replacement.
- Knee Measuring and Tracking extension angle & flexion.
- Easy to use at your own home without having to go to a physiotherapy or physical therapy appointment.

For patients who have had an ACL injury, they can use Curovate before surgery or pre-surgery, after ACL surgery, or if they are not planning to have ACL knee surgery. There is also an option to select knee strengthening and hip strengthening if you wish to work on stretching & flexibility exercises for knee pain relief. Curovate will help you achieve your prehab, rehab, and physiotherapy and physical therapy goals.

Curovate is a rehab physiotherapy and physical therapy app for people who have had a patellar tendon graft, hamstring tendon graft, quadriceps tendon graft, allograft, or cadaver graft used to repair their ACL. Curovate can also be used after ACL injury and for people planning to recover without knee surgery.

Total Knee Replacement or a knee replacement is a surgery for patients who suffer from knee osteoarthritis (knee arthritis), which causes knee pain and limits a person’s ability to exercise. Our physiotherapy and physical therapy app provides daily video knee exercises for people with knee arthritis as well as pre-surgery for knee replacement and after knee replacement. Curovate provides knee replacement stretching, strengthening, and virtual care PT workouts.

Technical issues? support@curovate.com
summary: Physical therapy exercises for ACL injury, knee replacement and hip replacement
